verses.text: \w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fourteenth \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Ezechias, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sennacherib|strong="H5576"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Assyrians \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fenced \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w took|strong="H8610"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* Rabsaces \w from|strong="H0413"\w* Lachis \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Ezechias \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w great|strong="H3515"\w* \w army|strong="H2426"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* conduit \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w upper|strong="H5945"\w* \w pool|strong="H1295"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w way|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fuller’s|strong="H3526"\w* held.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w there|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* Eliacim \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Helcias, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Sobna \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Joahe \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* Rabsaces \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Tell|strong="H0559"\w* Ezechias: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Assyrians: \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w confidence|strong="H0986"\w* \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* thou trustest?

\w Or|strong="H8193"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w or|strong="H8193"\w* \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* dost thou prepare \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*? \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* dost thou \w trust|strong="H0982"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou art revolted \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*?

\w Lo|strong="H2009"\w* thou trustest \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* broken \w staff|strong="H4938"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w*, \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w if|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H0935"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w lean|strong="H5564"\w*, \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* pierce \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* Pharao \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w or|strong="H0376"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* thou wilt \w answer|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w altars|strong="H4196"\w* Ezechias hath \w taken|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Juda \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: \w You|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*?

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* thyself \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Assyrians, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee two \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* thou wilt \w not|strong="H3201"\w* \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w find|strong="H5414"\w* \w riders|strong="H7392"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w how|strong="H0349"\w* wilt thou stand \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* judge \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* place, \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* least \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*? \w But|strong="H5921"\w* if thou \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w without|strong="H1107"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*? \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5650"\w* Eliacim, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* Sobna, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* Joahe \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Rabsaces: \w Speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Syrian tongue: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w understand|strong="H8085"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*: \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Jews’ \w language|strong="H3066"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w hearing|strong="H0241"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* Rabsaces \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: Hath \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w all|strong="H0398"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*; \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rather|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*; \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w own|strong="H0376"\w* \w dung|strong="H2716"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w urine|strong="H7890"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H7971"\w*?

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* Rabsaces \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H1419"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Jews’ \w language|strong="H3066"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* Ezechias \w deceive|strong="H5377"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* Ezechias \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H5337"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians.

\w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Ezechias: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Assyrians: \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H4325"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* advantage, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* ye \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w fig|strong="H8384"\w* \w tree|strong="H8384"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* ye \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w cistern|strong="H0953"\w*,

\w Till|strong="H5704"\w* \w I|strong="H5704"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* own, \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* corn \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*.

Neither let Ezechias trouble \w you|strong="H0853"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w us|strong="H5337"\w*. \w Have|strong="H0376"\w* \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Assyrians?

\w Where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w god|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Emath \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Arphad? \w where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w god|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Sepharvaim|strong="H5617"\w*? \w have|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w* \w out|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?

\w Who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w lands|strong="H0776"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H5337"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*?

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* held \w their|strong="H3588"\w* peace, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Eliacim \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Helcias, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Sobna \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Joahe \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w recorder|strong="H2142"\w*, \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Ezechias \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* rent, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Rabsaces.
